body.p:
March 26th 1865
No. 36. Remslee St.
Brooklyn N.Y.
Hon Jas. R. Page
Secty of State
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir,
Your kind of favor of the 15th inst. reached me only today, and I hasten to respond. I desire to be reappointed a Commissioner for Kentucky and enclose you the fee of five dollars.
Please forward me my Commission and I will send on my oaths of office &c according to Law.

Comr Deeds
New York
J R. Pomeroy
